short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, manage, and restore your browsing sessions / bookmarks with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you're conducting research, working on multiple projects, or simply want to keep your favorite tabs organized, Checkpoint ensures you never lose track of your open tabs again.

==============================
FEATURES:
☆ Save Sessions: Easily save all your open tabs with a single click. Organize your sessions by giving them custom titles.
☆ Restore Sessions: Quickly restore your saved sessions anytime, opening all the tabs exactly as you left them.
☆ Search Functionality: Find saved sessions by searching for titles or URLs, making it easy to locate specific tabs.
☆ Sync Across Devices: Your saved sessions are synced across all devices logged in with the same account, allowing you to access your tabs anywhere.
☆ Quick-Save Shortcut: Enable the quick-save shortcut (Alt + Shift + S) for even faster session saving.

==============================
ABOUT
 
Checkpoint was originally released in 2016 to help manage research projects effectively. It allows you to pause, switch contexts, and resume your work seamlessly.

Designed with simplicity and ease of use in mind, Checkpoint features fluid, non-intrusive animations and an intuitive interface. It's the perfect tool to keep your browsing sessions organized and accessible, no matter where you are.
